com.soa.identity
Interface IdentitySource

public interface IdentitySource

This is the interface for browsering identity system. Each IdentitySource instance must be configured with a proxy user account, which will be used when the user cannot be determined from the context or when the user is from different domain who is allowed to browse the identity store according to the rules defined in PolicyManager.

Create a new logging session with proxy user's credential.

the identity and login sessionof the proxy user.

releaseProxyUser

void releaseProxyUser(javax.security.auth.Subject subject)
Application should call this method if the proxy user login session is not needed so that the Module Provider can release this resource associated with the login session.

Parameters:
subject - the proxy user's login session

searchUsers

IResultSet searchUsers(javax.security.auth.Subject subject,
                       IUserFilter filter,
                       IUserSearchConstraint option)
                       throws GException
Search users based on some search criteria

Parameters:
subject - The user who initiate the search, it can be the proxy user also.
filter - Specify which users to search.
option - Specify page/sort option, and which attributes should be returned in the result
Returns:
List of IUserInfo objects
Throws:
GException

getAllGroupsAssignedToUser

IResultSet getAllGroupsAssignedToUser(javax.security.auth.Subject subject,
                                      java.lang.String userName,
                                      IGroupSearchConstraint option)
                                      throws GException
Get all the groups that a user belongs to. If the identity store supports nested groups, then returned value must have all the nested groups also.

Parameters:
subject - The user who initiate the search
user - The user that the group information should be returned
Returns:
List of IGroupInfo objects.
Throws:
ConnectorException
GException

true is the IdentitySource support sorting entries.
